🌍 Global Environmental Impact Dashboard

Name: Meghana Tripuraneni
Student ID: 801384302

🧭 Theme

This dashboard explores the environmental cost burdens caused by major topics like GHG emissions, water consumption, and la use across global territories. It highlights which impact types are most significant and where these burdens are distributed.

📊 Dummy Chart

<3>🔍 Design Rationale & Insights
  • Data visualizations are embedded in white containers for clarity and contrast.
  • Dark slate text improves readability on light backgrounds.
  • Clean font and hierarchy help users interpret trends quickly.
  • Designed to work responsively across screen sizes with good spacing.
Built with Observable on May 6, 2025.
